CTSP Reports Data Quality Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Study Management Country Management Live CTSP CTSP

CTSP Reports Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Study Management Country Management Live CTSP CTSP

CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Study Management Country Management Live CTSP CTSP

Quarterly Snapshot - Recruiting Studies Performance Metric takes a Snapshot of the enrollment status of all active sites that have been open for 3 months or more at the end of each Quarter. This metric is more sensitive to changes in current practice than data presented in the Portfolio Overview and Annual Productivity Trends data. It is a leading indicator of how annual site productivity and portfolio overview will read out in future. Taken together, this information along with the Annual Site Productivity overview provides the best overview of site productivity. Study Management Country Management Daily Business Objects CTMS

CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Study Management Country Management Live CTSP CTSP

CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Study Management Country Management Live CTSP CTSP

CTSP Reports Data Quality Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Study Management Country Management Live CTSP
Safety Access Summary Report Portfolio Study Provides oversight of site assess to safety reports in CTSP Safety by clinical departments and other stakeholders. Study Management Daily Business Objects
Safety Document Distribution Report Portfolio Study Country Site This report is intended to support decisions related to safety document distribution. By using the report one can: Support communication and interaction with an affiliate function or study team so that they know what actions and directions they should take to ensure distribution to their clinical trial sites and individuals Understand at a summary level what sites will utilize central distribution vs. which sites may require and exception process which may include manual distribution of safety documents Given specific local thresholds, understand where follow-up and possible action is needed in validated CTMS and CTP systems. Study Management Country Management Daily Business Objects

KMR Other Departmental Program Study Country Site Patient Functional KMR provides benchmarking, analytics and performance management services with a focus on biopharmaceutical R&D. It offers data, products, and services in the form of reports and on-line tools that inform strategy and day-to-day operations, including portfolio optimization, site selection, and enrollment management. Live Internet Other
LSPC Report Resourcing Program Functional The LSPC Summary report provides a high-level view of PDG FTE demand for molecular programs pending LSPC review. This report is generated on a monthly basis in conjunction with monthly LSPC meetings and only includes molecular programs defined on that month's LSPC agenda. This report has been created to increase your visibility into the PDG resources that may be requested during this month's LSPC meeting. Monthly Spotfire PlanSource LSPC Agenda

CTSP Reports Data Quality Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP

CTSP Reports Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP
Data Quality for Study Study Country An interactive report that provides a list of data errors and missing information for ongoing studies in CTMS and AIMs by study #, department or function. Hourly Business Objects via Compliance Machine CTMS PlanSource Quantum

CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP

Study Team Tracking Report Contacts This report provides a listing of the users assigned to the study from OL to CSM, the regions/countries involved (if insourced), and their forecast status as well as that for the study overall. Daily Business Objects Quantum
Study, Site and Contact Information for Disclosures Group Contacts Report providing information about studies, sites and contacts required for the Disclosures Group Daily Business Objects CTMS Plansource
StudyOptimizer Recruitment Reports Recruitment The following reports can be found in StudyOptimizer: -Cumulative Enrollment Report (Monthly, Quarterly, Weekly, Yearly) -Non-Cumulative Enrollment Report (Monthly, Quarterly, Weekly, Yearly) -Cumulative Plan Report (Monthly, Quarterly, Weekly, Yearly) -Aggregate Performance Report (Countries, Studies) -Enrollment By Therapeutic Area Report -Non-Cumulative Plan Report (Monthly, Quarterly, Weekly, Yearly) -Study Status Report -Plan Comparison Report SupplyOptimizer Monthly (Cumulative, Non-Cumulative) Live Study Optimizer Study Optimizer
Sub Cost Type Financial This report delivers purely forecast data by Quantum sub cost type level by month. 5 times/day Business Objects COGNOS
TA Portal Portfolio Recruitment Performance The following reports can be found on TA Portal. The TA portal consists of portfolio information across the therapeutic areas for active trials, including milestones and recruitment status. -Country Clinical Operations LT Dashboard -Diseascape -Clinical Operations Scorecard -Site Productivity -Study Performance -Portfolio Overview -Molecules by Study Phase -Proejcts by Study Phase -Portfolio by Indication -Study Milestones -Project Timelines -LIP by Year -Studies By Site -Molecules By Site -Indicatiions By Site -Personnel By Site -SMT Goals -LSPC Goals -Health Check (in testing) Live TA Portal CTMS PlanSource PRP Study Optimizer Rave SMT/Goals Database PharmaRes MDMS Phase Ib Tracker IVRS (pending)
Vendor Summary Financial The report is used to monitor the contract liability of the vendors within the study by joining actuals and forecasts to provide the vendor level latest estimate Daily Business Objects Quantum
Weighted Average Visit Cost Financial This report is designed to give a weighted average visit cost based on individual site fees defined in CTMS FINANCE Daily Business Objects CTMS PUBDB
Work Done Summary Financial Report showing the total amount to be paid or accrued for a specified period. Daily Business Objects CTMS PUBDB
Report Name Report Category Description Data Refresh Cycle Reporting Tool Data Source
Accounts per Study Contacts Report providing list and contact details of all accounts (Vendors) for one or several studies; this report is devided into study, country and site level accounts Daily Business Objects CTMS
Actuals Listing Detailed (SAP) Report Financial Listing of detailed investigator payments for a study or country Daily Business Objects SAP
Annual Recruitment Report Recruitment Lists recruitment details cumulatively, by month and by study for the selected year. Currently only available for insourced studies. Daily Business Objects CTMS PlanSource
CBT Site Contacts for Insourced EDC Studies Contacts Provides a list of all qualified site contacts for sending to the vendor responsible for providing CBT and Rave site access for the selected Rave study. See Tip Sheet on EDC Intranet site for business rules. Accepts GNE study first, or Roche otherwise. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Change Over Time Financial This report shows the current Latest Estimate, Published Budget, and the Latest Estimate for the previous 12 Quantum snapshots Daily Business Objects Quantum
Clinical Operations Scorecard Portfolio Recruitment Performance Resourcing A tool for PDG CCO, PDMA and LMA clinical operations teams that provides real time visibility into study recruitment, start-up and key performance metrics and milestones. Live TA Portal CTMS PlanSource PRP Study Optimizer Rave SMT/Goals Database PharmaRes MDMS Phase Ib Tracker IVRS (pending)
Cost Summary Financial This report provides an overview of either Early Budget, Forecast or Latest Estimate by cost type for each study. This is shown monthly and quarterly for the current and the next year. For the following years, costs are shown by year only. Daily Business Objects Quantum Cognos
Country Clinical Operations LT Dashboard Recruitment Performance Data Quality The Country Clinical Operations Leadership Team (CCO LT) Dashboard provides a single source of truth to improve Leadership Team’s collaboration within CCO and enable CCO LT to monitor and proactively manage trials. Live TA Portal CTMS PlanSource PRP Study Optimizer Rave SMT/Goals Database PharmaRes MDMS Phase Ib Tracker IVRS (pending)
Country Data Quality Report Data Quality An interactive report that provides a list of data errors and missing information for ongoing studies in CTMS and AIMs for one or more countries. Hourly Business Objects via Compliance Machine CTMS PlanSource
CTP Contingency plan Portfolio Provides a list of studies and sites as a contingency plan for CTSP Daily Business Objects CTMS CTSP
CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP
Data Quality for Study Data Quality An interactive report that provides a list of data errors and missing information for ongoing studies in CTMS and AIMs by study #, department or function. Hourly Business Objects via Compliance Machine CTMS PlanSource Quantum
Essential Document List per Country Portfolio Provides a list of all documents tracked in CTMS at the site/country/study level and the related document tracking for the selected country. Live Business Objects CTMS
Essential Document List per Study Portfolio Lists all site-level, country-level, and study-level documents for the selected study Live Business Objects CTMS
Ethics HA Submissions and Approvals List Portfolio Lists all Ethics submissions and approvals for each site and country for the selected study Live Business Objects CTMS
Ethics HA Submissions and Approvals List for Country Portfolio Provides a list of Ethics submissions and approvals for each site and country for the selected Country. Live Business Objects CTMS
eTMF Completeness Accountable Party Data Quality Provides summaries of the eTMF completeness within a study, country and site for accountable parties. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/Plansource milestone mappings and CTMS/Plansource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF
eTMF Completeness Document Type Data Quality Provides summaries of the eTMF completeness within a study, country and site for document types. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/PlanSource milestone mappings and CTMS/PlanSource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF
eTMF Completeness Documents Data Quality Provides details of the eTMF completeness within a study, country, site and compound. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/PlanSource milestone mappings and CTMS/PlanSource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF
eTMF Completeness Study, Country and Site Data Quality Provides summaries of the eTMF completeness within a study, country and site. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/PlanSource milestone mappings and CTMS/PlanSource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF
Flatiron DIVE (Data Insight, Visualization, and Exploration) Portfolio The purpose of the Flatiron DIVE dashboard is to allow you to get your hands on our interactive data visualizations, which summarize the most current Flatiron data and will give you an understanding of what data we have and how you might be able to use it. The visualizations include patient counts by indication, by state, demographics and baseline characteristics, biomarker status etc with more enhancements coming soon. Monthly Internet Other
Forecast Overview Report Financial This report provides visibility to the status of a study and the underlying Forecast nodes as it progresses towards an overall Study Status of Best Estimate in the Study Control module. For pRED and PDG studies, a Study Status of Best Estimate is required for the Forecast data to flow to Plan Source; up until that point, the data comes from the Early Study Budget. 5 times/day Business Objects COGNOS
FTE Task Detail Algo Demand Report (new) Resourcing Provides data listing of the algorithm demand for PDG. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PlanSource
FTE Task Detail Capacity Report (new) Resourcing Provides data listing of the capacity for PDG. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PlanSource PharmaRes
FTE Task Detail Demand Report (Activity Dates) Resourcing Provides data listing of the adjusted demand for PDG, including specifically activity start and end dates. Data file is used to support resource planning analysis. Daily Business Objects PlanSource
FTE Task Detail Demand Report (new) Resourcing Provides data listing of the adjusted demand for PDG. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PlanSource
FTE Task Detail Supply Report (new) Resourcing Provides data listing of the supply for PDG. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PlanSource
GPRS Recruitment Performance Study and site level site activation, recruitment, milestone data and metrics Daily Business Objects CTMS
GSL GSM Report Portfolio This report provides the GSL with an overview of a single study. It provides information on study and country startup, progress and close-down, study documents and PVCs. Daily Business Objects CTMS Goblet
Head Count Capacity_PDG (Real Capacity) Resourcing Provides data listing of the real capacity for PDG, excluding absences. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PharmaRes
Head Count Finance (Budget Headcount) Resourcing Provides data listing of the budget headcount for PDG, including absences and open requisitions. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PharmaRes
Informed Consent List Portfolio Lists all versions of the informed consent form signed by the subject for the selected study Live Business Objects CTMS
Master Trial List Resourcing Provides data listing of the study milestones for planned and actual dates. Data file is used to support various visualizations using Spotfire and Tableau for resourcing planning. Daily Business Objects PlanSource CTMS
Monthly F&G Investigator Cost Financial Detailed report of the payments for completed work at an Investigational site during a defined period.  Can also be used for detailed payment reconciliation at site Daily Business Objects CTMS PUBDB
Monthly Tracking Financial One of the key reports within Quantum showing actuals, future forecast and latest estimates Daily Business Objects Quantum
MyDQ 2.0 Data Quality Provides a Data quality overview for PDG, showing metrics for regions, countries and study-countries Daily Spotfire via Compliance Machine CTMS eTMF PlanSource
Non Subject Detail Forecast Report Financial This report will show the actual patient recruitment it affects those cost types for which a recruitment curve is the basis of the expense. This could then be used as a basis for accruals for this type expenses 5 times/day Business Objects COGNOS
PDG Cycle Time Metrics Performance The cycle time report has milestones and durations available for reporting. Daily Business Objects CTMS
PDG Subject Recruitment Recruitment Shows overall recruitment period for recruiting studies comparing planned versus actual number of subjects recruited. (This report is refreshed once a day starting at 16h Basel time.) Daily Business Objects CTMS
Portfolio Overview & Annual Trend Performance See Report Info tab for detailed description Daily Business Objects CTMS
PRP - Missing Targets Recruitment Shows an overview of the deadlines related to the Recruitment Targets in Study, Country and Site level. Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Patient Recruitment Planning Compliance Report Recruitment The Patient Recruitment Planning report displays planning targets in the Patient Recruitment Planning tool (PRP) and rates it against a set of business rules described in PRP Business Process Documents, giving yearly overview. Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Recruitment Status Report Recruitment Shows individual study recruitment plans at a study, country and site level against CTMS actual recruitment. Where available, the Study Optimizer planned curve is also available. Live Spotfire PRP Study Optimizer
PRP - Recruitment Strategy Report Recruitment This report shows the key Targets, Milestones and the Risk management plans captured in PRP. The applicability of the report is aligned with the scope of PRP usage e.g. for PDG studies, PRP is not used for Study-level recruitment planning, therefore the Recruitment Strategy Report is not applicable at Study level for PDG studies. Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Recruitment System Comparison Report Recruitment Depicts the comparison of Recruitment Planning in Study and Country level. Where available CTMS and Study Optimizer Planning is included. Live Spotfire CTMS PRP Study Optimizer
PRP - Target Changes Recruitment Shows an overview of the changes made in the Subject Recruitment Planning in Study, Country and Site level. Live Spotfire PRP
Quantum Data Quality for Country Data Quality The report provides a list of data quality issues for the selected study(s). All the information required for the location identification and resolution of the issues is provided to the user. Daily Business Objects via Compliance Machine Quantum CTMS
Quantum Data Quality for Study Data Quality The report provides a list of data quality issues for the selected study(s). All the information required for the location identification and resolution of the issues is provided to the user. Daily Business Objects via Compliance Machine Quantum
Quarterly Snapshot - Recruiting Studies Performance Metric takes a Snapshot of the enrollment status of all active sites that have been open for 3 months or more at the end of each Quarter. This metric is more sensitive to changes in current practice than data presented in the Portfolio Overview and Annual Productivity Trends data. It is a leading indicator of how annual site productivity and portfolio overview will read out in future. Taken together, this information along with the Annual Site Productivity overview provides the best overview of site productivity. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Received Samples Report Portfolio All Samples received by the sample handling labs in BRM. Daily Business Objects Salome
Received Samples Report - Storage Location Portfolio Report is mainly for the sample handling labs. The data used in this report is not extracted from the Salome database but from a daily snapshot of Salome database. This may lead to discrepancies between Business Objects and Salome data. Daily Business Objects Salome
SAE List for Country Portfolio Lists SAEs and their associated attributes for all studies in the selected country Daily Business Objects CTMS
SAE List for Study Portfolio Lists SAEs and their associated attributes for the selected study across all participating countries Daily Business Objects CTMS
Safety Distribution for Study Portfolio Lists Safety Distribution view contacts for all countries and sites in the selected study. Also lists sites where the SD view is empty - and not using CTP Daily Business Objects CTMS
Safety Document Distribution Report Portfolio The report provides CTP training status for all sites in addition to identifying sites that are not set up for electronic safety document distribution. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Safety Document Distribution Report Portfolio This report is intended to support decisions related to safety document distribution. By using the report one can: Support communication and interaction with an affiliate function or study team so that they know what actions and directions they should take to ensure distribution to their clinical trial sites and individuals Understand at a summary level what sites will utilize central distribution vs. which sites may require and exception process which may include manual distribution of safety documents Given specific local thresholds, understand where follow-up and possible action is needed in validated CTMS and CTP systems. Daily Business Objects CTSP CTMS
Screen Failure List Portfolio Lists all subjects who have failed screening (including reason) for the selected study Daily Business Objects CTMS
Shipping Address List Portfolio Lists of all shipment address for the selected study Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Accounts for Countries Contacts Lists institution names and addresses of all Accounts associated with sites within the selected country(ies) Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Accounts for Studies Contacts Lists institution names and addresses of all Accounts associated with sites within the selected study(ies) Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Activation Recruitment Performance Annually trended site activation, patient recruitment, and active patient summary for high level reporting, presented in tables and graphs Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Activation Recruitment and Active Patients Performance Annually trended site activation, patient recruitment, and active patient summary for high level reporting, presented in tables and graphs Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site and Subject Issues for Country (custom) Performance Issue report, filtered for Sample and Consent related issues. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site and Subject Issues for Country (review) Performance Issue report, filtered for Sample and Consent related issues. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site and Subject Issues for Study Portfolio Lists Site and Subject issues across all countries participating in the selected study Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Contacts for Studies Contacts Lists names and addresses of all Contacts associated with sites within the selected study(ies) Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Contacts for Studies (Active/Inactive) Contacts Provides contact information for sites Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Feasibility Activity List for Country Portfolio Provides a list of activities related to site feasibility for the selected country. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Site Feasibility Activity List for Study Portfolio Provides a list of activities related to site feasibility for the selected study. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Startup and Recruitment Metrics for Country and Region Performance Summary and detailed listing of actual, planned, and trended recruitment and site activations for all studies in the selected country within the selected time period Daily Business Objects CTMS
Startup and Recruitment Metrics for Study Portfolio Summary and detailed listing of actual, planned, and trended patient recruitment, site activations and other key milestones for the selected study across participating countries Daily Business Objects CTMS
Studies By PI Portfolio Lists investigators and their participation in studies for the selected country within the selected time period. Includes high level enrollment and milestones Daily Business Objects CTMS
Studies per Country Portfolio Provides an overview of all studies conducted in the selected country within a given time period. Provides a comprehensive summary listing of active studies for the purposes of Inspection readiness and compliance preparation visits. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study and Site Milestones Portfolio Listing of Study, Country and Site level milestone dates for all countries participating in the selected study, including baseline, planned and actual dates. Missing dates or planned dates < today, with no associated actual dates, are highlighted Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study and Site Milestones Per Country Portfolio Lists study, country and site level milestone dates, including cycle times, for the selected study within a single country Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study Contacts and Overview Contacts Provides contact details for all current personnel on a study; this report is devided into site staff, monitoring staff and study personnel sections Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study Events Portfolio Lists key events for all studies in the selected country, including planned and actual recruitment, and key study and country milestones Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study Summary Portfolio One page summary of all studies within the selected country, including high level study level attributes, recruitment, milestones, and key milestone cycle times for internal users Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study Summary Portfolio Summary of enrollment and milestone information, including key milestone measures (cycle times) across countries for the selected study for external users Daily Business Objects CTMS
Study Team List Contacts Lists internal and external personnel associated with a study - including their role and start and end dates, for the selected study and date intervals Daily Business Objects CTMS

Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Recruitment Strategy Report Recruitment This report shows the key Targets, Milestones and the Risk management plans captured in PRP. The applicability of the report is aligned with the scope of PRP usage e.g. for PDG studies, PRP is not used for Study-level recruitment planning, therefore the Recruitment Strategy Report is not applicable at Study level for PDG studies. Change Over Time Financial Program Study Country This report shows the current Latest Estimate, Published Budget, and the Latest Estimate for the previous 12 Quantum snapshots Daily Business Objects
Cost Summary Financial Program Study Country This report provides an overview of either Early Budget, Forecast or Latest Estimate by cost type for each study. This is shown monthly and quarterly for the current and the next year. For the following years, costs are shown by year only. Daily Business Objects
Early Study Budget Financial Study This report compares the different budget scenarios and assumptions in order to decide which is the best scenario (for example, cheapest, fastest, insourced, outsourced etc.). It is used for the budget approval process by the required governance bodies in early programme planning. 5 times/day Business Objects
Forecast Overview Report Financial Study Country This report provides visibility to the status of a study and the underlying Forecast nodes as it progresses towards an overall Study Status of Best Estimate in the Study Control module. For pRED and PDG studies, a Study Status of Best Estimate is required for the Forecast data to flow to Plan Source; up until that point, the data comes from the Early Study Budget. 5 times/day Business Objects
Non Subject Detail Forecast Report Financial Study This report will show the actual patient recruitment it affects those cost types for which a recruitment curve is the basis of the expense. This could then be used as a basis for accruals for this type expenses 5 times/day Business Objects
SOA (Quantum) Structure Report Financial Study This report provides an overview on the structure of the SoA created in Cognos and used in the study without needing to have access to the Study Control module in Cognos. 5 times/day Business Objects
Study Assignment & Status Report Portfolio Study Similar to the "Study Tracking Report" it allows for the current status of the study forecast to be reviewed along with the individuals assigned to the study. 5 times/day Business Objects
Study Assumptions Comparison Portfolio Study Key report to get an overview over the bottom up forecasting process in the affiliates and the assumptions used in each country participating in a study. 5 times/day Business Objects
Study Control Update Report Portfolio Study This shows the last time and which user ran the system link to refresh study control. 5 times/day Business Objects

CTSP Reports Data Quality Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP

Report Name Report Category Info Level Description Data Refresh Cycle Reporting Tool
Approved Budget and Latest Estimate Comparison Financial Program Study The report is used to compare the published Early Budget with the Latest Estimate (LE) and evaluate variances. Daily Business Objects
Change Over Time Financial Program Study Country This report shows the current Latest Estimate, Published Budget, and the Latest Estimate for the previous 12 Quantum snapshots Daily Business Objects
Cost Summary Financial Program Study Country This report provides an overview of either Early Budget, Forecast or Latest Estimate by cost type for each study. This is shown monthly and quarterly for the current and the next year. For the following years, costs are shown by year only. Daily Business Objects
Data Quality for Study Data Quality Study Country An interactive report that provides a list of data errors and missing information for ongoing studies in CTMS and AIMs by study #, department or function. Hourly Business Objects via Compliance Machine
Monthly Tracking Financial Study Country Site One of the key reports within Quantum showing actuals, future forecast and latest estimates Daily Business Objects
Q-Finance Accrual Journal Report Financial Study This report enables the simple transfer of calculated accrual information from QFinance into the standard SAP journal entry template (for posting in SAP) 5 times/day Business Objects
Q-Finance Accruals Detail Report Financial Study Accruals detail report provides a current year monthly trend of accruals and invoices paid by contract. 5 times/day Business Objects
Q-Finance Clinical Study Accrual Forecast Report Financial Study This report is used to display the accrual for the remaining life of the study. 5 times/day Business Objects
Q-Finance Contract Exception Report Financial Study This report lists differences between Quantum (maintained by the Study Manager) and Q-Finance (maintained by the Finance Controller). This includes new contracts, new change orders and amendments to existing data. 5 times/day Business Objects
Q-Finance Global Lead Reconciliation Report Financial Study This report represents the clinical liability in Quantum Finance and needs to be reconciled to the clinical liability in SAP accounting system. The report summarizes contract accruals less contract invoices paid on a monthly, year to date and project to date basis and includes multiple site contract information. 5 times/day Business Objects
Q-Finance Non Subject (Contracts) Summary Report Financial Study Non Subject (Contracts) Summary Report provides a list of all contracts and change orders with start and end dates, currency, & description. The report is by protocol, by cost type, by WBS code and by Vendor 5 times/day Business Objects
Q-Finance PO Vendor Lookup Report Financial Study Lists all POs and associated vendors in Q-Finance, along with supporting information such as WBC Code, Study, Theme, GL code, local cost centre 5 times/day Business Objects
Quantum Data Quality for Country Data Quality Study Country The report provides a list of data quality issues for the selected study(s). All the information required for the location identification and resolution of the issues is provided to the user. Daily Business Objects via Compliance Machine
Quantum Data Quality for Study Data Quality Study Country The report provides a list of data quality issues for the selected study(s). All the information required for the location identification and resolution of the issues is provided to the user. Daily Business Objects via Compliance Machine
Study Team Tracking Report Contacts Study Country This report provides a listing of the users assigned to the study from OL to CSM, the regions/countries involved (if insourced), and their forecast status as well as that for the study overall. Daily Business Objects
Vendor Summary Financial Study The report is used to monitor the contract liability of the vendors within the study by joining actuals and forecasts to provide the vendor level latest estimate Daily Business Objects

CTSP Reports Data Quality Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP

CTSP Reports Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP
Data Quality for Study Study Country An interactive report that provides a list of data errors and missing information for ongoing studies in CTMS and AIMs by study #, department or function. Hourly Business Objects via Compliance Machine CTMS PlanSource Quantum

CTP Contingency plan Portfolio Provides a list of studies and sites as a contingency plan for CTSP Daily Business Objects CTMS CTSP
CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP
Data Quality for Study Data Quality An interactive report that provides a list of data errors and missing information for ongoing studies in CTMS and AIMs by study #, department or function. Hourly Business Objects via Compliance Machine CTMS PlanSource Quantum
Essential Document List per Country Portfolio Provides a list of all documents tracked in CTMS at the site/country/study level and the related document tracking for the selected country. Live Business Objects CTMS
Essential Document List per Study Portfolio Lists all site-level, country-level, and study-level documents for the selected study Live Business Objects CTMS
Ethics HA Submissions and Approvals List Portfolio Lists all Ethics submissions and approvals for each site and country for the selected study Live Business Objects CTMS
Ethics HA Submissions and Approvals List for Country Portfolio Provides a list of Ethics submissions and approvals for each site and country for the selected Country. Live Business Objects CTMS

eTMF Completeness Document Type Data Quality Provides summaries of the eTMF completeness within a study, country and site for document types. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/PlanSource milestone mappings and CTMS/PlanSource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF
eTMF Completeness Documents Data Quality Provides details of the eTMF completeness within a study, country, site and compound. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/PlanSource milestone mappings and CTMS/PlanSource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF
eTMF Completeness Study, Country and Site Data Quality Provides summaries of the eTMF completeness within a study, country and site. Based on eTMF placeholders, eTMF document type to CTMS/PlanSource milestone mappings and CTMS/PlanSource data. Daily Business Objects eTMF

PRP - Missing Targets Recruitment Shows an overview of the deadlines related to the Recruitment Targets in Study, Country and Site level. Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Patient Recruitment Planning Compliance Report Recruitment The Patient Recruitment Planning report displays planning targets in the Patient Recruitment Planning tool (PRP) and rates it against a set of business rules described in PRP Business Process Documents, giving yearly overview. Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Recruitment Status Report Recruitment Shows individual study recruitment plans at a study, country and site level against CTMS actual recruitment. Where available, the Study Optimizer planned curve is also available. Live Spotfire PRP Study Optimizer
PRP - Recruitment Strategy Report Recruitment This report shows the key Targets, Milestones and the Risk management plans captured in PRP. The applicability of the report is aligned with the scope of PRP usage e.g. for PDG studies, PRP is not used for Study-level recruitment planning, therefore the Recruitment Strategy Report is not applicable at Study level for PDG studies. Live Spotfire PRP
PRP - Recruitment System Comparison Report Recruitment Depicts the comparison of Recruitment Planning in Study and Country level. Where available CTMS and Study Optimizer Planning is included. Live Spotfire CTMS PRP Study Optimizer
PRP - Target Changes Recruitment Shows an overview of the changes made in the Subject Recruitment Planning in Study, Country and Site level. Live Spotfire PRP
READ Compliance Affiliate Study teams to have oversight of their patient data and CRA activity related to data. Daily Spotfire RAVE
Quantum Data Quality for Country Data Quality The report provides a list of data quality issues for the selected study(s). All the information required for the location identification and resolution of the issues is provided to the user. Daily Business Objects via Compliance Machine Quantum CTMS
Quantum Data Quality for Study Data Quality The report provides a list of data quality issues for the selected study(s). All the information required for the location identification and resolution of the issues is provided to the user. Daily Business Objects via Compliance Machine Quantum

Quarterly Snapshot - Recruiting Studies Performance Metric takes a Snapshot of the enrollment status of all active sites that have been open for 3 months or more at the end of each Quarter. This metric is more sensitive to changes in current practice than data presented in the Portfolio Overview and Annual Productivity Trends data. It is a leading indicator of how annual site productivity and portfolio overview will read out in future. Taken together, this information along with the Annual Site Productivity overview provides the best overview of site productivity. Daily Business Objects CTMS
Received Samples Report Portfolio All Samples received by the sample handling labs in BRM. Daily Business Objects Salome
Received Samples Report - Storage Location Portfolio Report is mainly for the sample handling labs. Daily Business Objects Salome

Safety Document Distribution Report Portfolio This report is intended to support decisions related to safety document distribution. By using the report one can: Support communication and interaction with an affiliate function or study team so that they know what actions and directions they should take to ensure distribution to their clinical trial sites and individuals Understand at a summary level what sites will utilize central distribution vs. which sites may require and exception process which may include manual distribution of safety documents Given specific local thresholds, understand where follow-up and possible action is needed in validated CTMS and CTP systems. Daily Business Objects CTSP CTMS

CTSP Reports Data Quality The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP CTSP
DiSCO (Dashboard in Spotfire for Clin Ops) Recruitment Performance Resourcing Provides study information for the Asia Pacific region and its countries, includine recruitment, study, country, and site status, milestones, and monitoring visit reviews. Weekly Spotfire CTMS

Live Spotfire PRP

Quarterly Snapshot - Recruiting Studies Performance Metric takes a Snapshot of the enrollment status of all active sites that have been open for 3 months or more at the end of each Quarter. This metric is more sensitive to changes in current practice than data presented in the Portfolio Overview and Annual Productivity Trends data. It is a leading indicator of how annual site productivity and portfolio overview will read out in future. Taken together, this information along with the Annual Site Productivity overview provides the best overview of site productivity. Daily Business Objects CTMS

Safety Document Distribution Report Portfolio This report is intended to support decisions related to safety document distribution. By using the report one can: Support communication and interaction with an affiliate function or study team so that they know what actions and directions they should take to ensure distribution to their clinical trial sites and individuals Understand at a summary level what sites will utilize central distribution vs. which sites may require and exception process which may include manual distribution of safety documents Given specific local thresholds, understand where follow-up and possible action is needed in validated CTMS and CTP systems. Daily Business Objects CTSP CTMS

Quarterly Snapshot - Recruiting Studies Performance Study Country Site Metric takes a Snapshot of the enrollment status of all active sites that have been open for 3 months or more at the end of each Quarter. This metric is more sensitive to changes in current practice than data presented in the Portfolio Overview and Annual Productivity Trends data. It is a leading indicator of how annual site productivity and portfolio overview will read out in future. Taken together, this information along with the Annual Site Productivity overview provides the best overview of site productivity. Daily Business Objects

CTSP Reports Data Quality Study Country Site The following reports can be found in CTSP: -Site Access Report-The SAR shows if any end-user at the site has accessed a particular safety document, and identifies who the first end-user was to access the report at the site. Access is denoted by site-level. The report will only display the first person to access the report and the first time that they accessed it. -Safety Listing Report-Lists all documents distributed by compound, therapeutic area, and date distributed. This report provides an overall listing of all safety documents posted. -Transmission Status Report-The TSR shows whether an email was successfully sent to the end-user or if it 'failed'. A 'failed' email means that the CTP system received an error message from the end-user's email server. This is also called a "bounce back" email. -Unblinded Download Listing Report -User Access Report-The UAR lists the access status (by individual user) at the site. Identifies when a user has been sent and/or accessed a safety document NOTE: *This information is required for export at the end of the study to be included on Site Archival CD. -User Training Status Report-The UTSR provides the date when a training invitation was sent to an end-user and if the invitee has completed or started training. The report also displays if the end-user is active or inactive in CTMS. Live CTSP

Visualising PDG Data Data usage visualised using the CDE (Critical Data Entity) model. A hierarchical description of how data is used, where it is taken from and what it means. CDEs are essentially business questions that may appear in reports or dashboards.
Report Name Description
Biopharma Clinical An all-in-one solution for Feasibility Analysis, Benchmark Modeling and Site Selection. *Login required?
CenterWatch CenterWatch provides proprietary data and information analysis on clinical trials through a variety of newsletters, books, databases, market research, benchmark reports and information services used by all industry professionals involved in the management and conduct of clinical trials.
ClinicalTrials.gov ClinicalTrials.gov is a registry and results database of publicly and privately supported clinical studies of human participants conducted around the world, including relevant history, policies, and laws.
CMR CMR provides solutions for event registration & housing management.
Covance PharmAcuity Covance is a global contract research organization (CRO) offering Solutions Made Real® by providing nonclinical, preclinical, clinical and commercialization services to pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies to help reduce the time and costs associated with drug development.
Decision Resources Biopharma DRG is a global information and technology services company that provides proprietary data and solutions to the healthcare industry. Decision Resources provides in-depth research on the trends, emerging developments and market potential of the drug industry, and offers research publications and advisory and consulting services.
KMR KMR provides benchmarking, analytics and performance management services with a focus on biopharmaceutical R&D. It offers data, products, and services in the form of reports and on-line tools that inform strategy and day-to-day operations, including portfolio optimization, site selection, and enrollment management.
Metrics Champion Consortium MCC is an independent membership organization that looks to drive improvements through the collaborative use of performance metrics.
searchXs (Search Across Systems) Search Across Systems (searchXs) provides an easy way to access and retrieve information from multiple systems for all Roche users.
TA Scan ta-Scan is an intelligence platform for clinical development, a product of MDCPartners. MDCPartners specializes in business intelligence and strategic consultancy for clinical trial optimization and regulatory compliance for the pharmaceutical and medical device industry.
Trial Trove Trialtrove is a comprehensive real-time source of pharmaceutical clinical trials intelligence, supported by industry analysts. It provides a complete view of the global clinical trial landscape, allowing easy competitor tracking and protocol design comparison to results readouts.
